room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Escape Plan Georgia in Atlanta
room_address: 3735 Harrison Road SW, Suite 600, Loganville, GA 30052
room_description:
You recently lost your job and got involved with some local criminals. They are planning to rob Loganville State Bank. The team knows your skills and wants you to be the one to crack the safe.
The criminals have already entered the bank managerâ€™s office, where the door to the vault is located. Your team has hidden clues and hints to help you break into the vault. The security system has been hacked and you have one hour until it is back online and the police are notified. Can you crack the safe in time to walk away with the money and avoid the police?
